import React from 'react' const AboutUsSection = () => { return (

What we're all about

Soc Awk is the next generation online marketplace for trading comics, cards, collectibles and memorabilia. Soc Awk believes in making the buying, selling and trading process as simple as possible. We value the importance of your collection, that is why Soc Awk makes it convenient to showcase your collection through a digital portfolio.

) } export default AboutUsSection
